statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the parallelogram above. Side lengths are measurements.

solution.p: Perimeter is the sum of the sides: \displaystyle{2}{\left({5.8}+{6.43}\right)}={24.46}\approx{24.46}.
Area is height times base (side perpendicular to height): \displaystyle{6.43}\cdot{5.45}={35.0435}\approx{35}.
